meanings.sent1: Her recklessnesses in driving led to multiple accidents.
meanings.sent2: His recklessnesses in handling the fragile items resulted in breakage.
meanings.sent3: The recklessnesses of the squirrel trying to steal food from the cat were entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The recklessnesses of the storm were evident in the destruction it left behind.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of avoiding recklessnesses in experiments to prevent accidents.
